Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageSource
    A source of messages, and which must be able to handle a response.
    RequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncRequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>  
    BlockingReactorImpl  
    CloserImpl  
    Inbox
    Provides at least two queues for a targetReactor's incoming messages, where the first queue is a concurrent linked queue for messages passed from other reactors and the other(s) are doLocal queues for messages that are passed using the targetReactor's own thread.
    IsolationInbox
    The inbox used by IsolationReactor, the next request is not made available for processing until a result is assigned to the previous request.
    IsolationReactorImpl  
    MessageCloser  
    NonBlockingReactorImpl  
    Outbox
    An outbox holds a collection of doSend buffers.
    PlantImpl  
    ReactorImpl
    Base class for targetReactor.
    RequestImplBase<RESPONSE_TYPE>  
    SchedulableSemaphore
    A timeout timer built on a semaphore, created by calling Plant.schedulableSemaphore(_millisecondDelay).
    SignalResponseProcessor
    Used to flag a message as a 1-way message.
    SwingBoundReactorImpl  
    SyncRequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>  
    ThreadBoundReactorImpl  
    UnboundReactorImpl
    Common code for NonBlockingReactor and IsolationReactor, which are not bound to a thread.
